p: Transfections using Lipofectamine 2000 or Lipofectamine 3000 transfection reagent (Life Technologies) were performed according to the manufacturer’s protocol. For co-immunoprecipitation (co-IP) experiments, a total of 2.5 µg plasmids was transfected into approximately 1.2 × 10 6 cells. For the other experiments, a total of 0.5 µg plasmids was transfected into approximately 2 × 10 5 cells.
